message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to your operations, even more so than you realize. It's truly one-of-a-kind. I'm offering it to you for $1,500,000. I think that's a fair price considering the potential return on investment you'll see.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,500,000 is unfortunately outside my budget. Given the product's potential value to me, I'm willing to pay $1,100,000.  This is a fair price that allows me to acquire the product while remaining within my financial constraints.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,100,000 is significantly below the true value of this product.  I'm confident it will generate substantial returns for your business.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $1,350,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm confident this product will be valuable, but I need to stay within my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $1,200,000.  This price reflects the product's value to me and allows me to acquire it without exceeding my financial limits.
